item.title: Proof-of-DDoS: A 'Malicious' New Consensus Mechanism
item.description:
Proof-of-DDoS: A 'Malicious' New Consensus Mechanism

A University of Colorado assistant professor and a Ph.D. student from the University of Michigan have formulated a new Altcoin that has an unusual consensus mechanism. The theoretical Also read: Purse Releases Open-Source Wallet Code for 'Philosophical Reasons' cryptocurrency, dubbed "DDoSCoin," pays attackers for participating in distributed denial of service (DDoS) attacks.

item.title: Why the latest bitcoin hack should make you worried about your money
item.description:
Why the latest bitcoin hack should make you worried about your money

The digital currency markets repeatedly remind us of a tired but true maxim: your money is only as secure as the bank that guards it. After a recent hack resulted in the theft of $70 million worth of bitcoin, Hong Kong-based Bitfinex caused a minor panic when it announced it would spread the losses equally among all its customers, even those whose holdings weren't touched.

item.title: Research and training on how to use Bitcoins
item.description:
Research and training on how to use Bitcoins

Back to overview Information technology and telecommunications 1-5 hours per week / 25 weeks Our organization is seeking new sources of revenue and looking for alternative ways of raising funds by accepting donations in Bitcoins and expanding our global support base.

item.title: Ethereum Developers Attempt to Dump Over 7 Mil ETCs into Exchanges - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Ethereum Developers Attempt to Dump Over 7 Mil ETCs into Exchanges - NEWSBTC

The role of few Ethereum developers is speculated in the recent attempt to exchange over 7 million ETC's retrieved from the DAOs associated with the recent attack. Read more... Did the Ethereum Foundation secretly try to kill its sibling rival Ethereum Classic? The question may never be answered.

item.title: CoPay Mobile Wallet May Integrate Gift Card Option Soon
item.description:
CoPay Mobile Wallet May Integrate Gift Card Option Soon

Bitcoin wallets make it easy for users to store, spend, and receive cryptocurrency on their favorite device. Particularly mobile wallets add a major convenience factor, both of novice and advanced users. Copay, the mobile wallet solution that hardly makes headlines, seems to offer gift card integration shortly.

item.title: Force of Will Targets Japan With Blockchain-based Trading Card Game
item.description:
Force of Will Targets Japan With Blockchain-based Trading Card Game

Blockchain-based trading card games are an opportunity well worth exploring by developers all over the world.Spells of Genesis; a game,e developed by EverDreamSoft; has seen its fair share of success so far: But its creators are looking to the future, and they have announced the developed of a new game, called Force of Will Battle Simulator.

item.title: No title
item.description: Happy to say that AB 1326, CA's bad digital currency bill, has been dropped by the sponsor and will no longer be pursued this year. #bitcoin

item.title: A bounty of $3.5 million in bitcoin is being offered for info on a cyber heist
item.description:
A bounty of $3.5 million in bitcoin is being offered for info on a cyber heist

Hong Kong exchange Bitfinex is offering 5 percent of the $70 million stolen last week.

item.title: How do I buy Bitcoin online in India?
item.description:
How do I buy Bitcoin online in India?

Answer (1 of 2): You need a PAN CARD and netbanking. If you have an android phone, download ZEBPAY. Its the easiest way to buy bitcoins. You cannot buy bitcoins using debit/credit card on zebpay or transfer money to them using 3rd party sites. Netbanking is a must!

item.title: Why are redeeming inputs themselves scripts?
item.description:
Why are redeeming inputs themselves scripts?

When redeeming a UTXO it is necessary to provide certain values such as a public key and a signature. These values come in the form of a script. First, the value providing scriptSig script runs.
